title: REGR: 7.0 Java Client API unit-test failures
description:
Java Client API unit-test failures

Failed tests:   testAggregates(com.marklogic.client.test.ValuesHandleTest): Aggregate 1 should be between 11.4 and 12
  testCoVariances(com.marklogic.client.test.TuplesHandleTest): Nine tuples are expected expected:<12> but was:<9>
  testNWayTuples(com.marklogic.client.test.TuplesHandleTest): Four tuples are expected expected:<4> but was:<0>
  testAggregates(com.marklogic.client.test.TuplesHandleTest): The covariance is between 1.551 and 1.552
  testValuesHandle(com.marklogic.client.test.TuplesHandleTest): Nine tuples are expected expected:<12> but was:<9>

changeHistory.comment:
Charles, from our last email conversation about this, I think it's document setup issue (mismatch between ci and qa environment):

"The others have to do with document setup, which is changed in the bootstrapping we use on ci and on laptops, but not in qa.  It would be great to switch qa over to the same bootstrapping method if possible -- otherwise we'll just update your setup script to match."
After talking to Megha, suggested to move it to EA2
New unit test failure ticket duplicates this one.
